metadata.title: CVE-2023-27734 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: An issue found in Eteran edb-debugger v.1.3.0 allows a local attacker tocausea denial of service via the collect_symbols function inplugins/BinaryInfo/symbols.cpp.

criterions.comment: edb-debugger: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
